name: Dysterra
storyline: Players have to find a way to survive, mining the most evolved energy mineral Terrasite on abandoned Earth where a big pillar of fire, Terrafire, is destroying everything. Your mission is to discover raw materials and craft tools for your survival. You'll have to hunt animals for food, construct your own housing and save yourself from NPCs and other unexpected environmental changes.
summary: Dysterra is a large-scale multiplayer sci-fi survival game available on Steam that embodies deep crafting systems such as construction and production, while offering players exciting conflicts and environmental calamities within the visual power of the Unreal Engine 4. It is developed by Reality MagiQ and published by Kakao Games.
